item.title: 关于美联储 2026 年走向的债券市场辩论即将升温
item.description: 随着一系列关键经济数据的公布，美国国债市场关于美联储未来降息幅度的大讨论即将升温。【原文：The big debate in the US Treasury market over the extent of Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts ahead is about to heat up with a string of pivotal economic data releases.】

item.title: 据说 SK Capital 接近达成收购瑞士药品分销商 Swixx 的交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，美国私募股权公司 SK Capital Partners 即将达成收购瑞士药品分销公司 Swixx Biopharma SA 的交易。【原文：US private equity firm SK Capital Partners is nearing a deal to acquire Swiss drug distribution company Swixx Biopharma SA, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 法国寻求推迟欧盟对南美贸易协定的投票
item.description: 法国正在寻求推迟欧盟定于本周就与南美一些最大经济体达成的自由贸易协定进行的投票，称保护欧盟农民和消费者的措施还不够充分。【原文：France is seeking to delay a European Union vote scheduled for this week on a free-trade agreement with some of the largest South American economies, saying that measures to protect the bloc’s farmers and consumers are insufficient.】

item.title: 哈塞特称特朗普可就美联储政策自由发表意见
item.description: 国家经济委员会主任凯文-哈塞特（Kevin Hassett）表示，如果他被选中领导美联储，他将考虑唐纳德-特朗普总统的政策意见，但央行的利率决策仍将保持独立。【原文：National Economic Council head Kevin Hassett said he’d consider President Donald Trump’s policy opinions if picked to lead the Federal Reserve, but that the central bank’s interest rate decisions would remain independent.】

item.title: 东京燃气将投资美国下游资产以推动增长
item.description: 日本最大的燃料分销商东京燃气公司计划投资美国下游资产，以提高收益并加强其能源供应链的最后一环。【原文：Tokyo Gas Co., Japan’s biggest distributor of the fuel, plans to invest in US downstream assets to lift earnings and reinforce the last leg of its energy supply chain.】

item.title: 米莱降低关税，中国购买稀有阿根廷小麦货物
item.description: 阿根廷潘帕斯草原的农民们正在收获创纪录的小麦，哈维尔-米莱伊总统也正在降低装运小麦的关税，以促进出口，在这样的时刻，中国购买了几十年来第一批阿根廷小麦。【原文：China is buying its first cargo of Argentine wheat in decades at a time when farmers on the Pampas are harvesting a record crop and President Javier Milei is trimming tariffs on shipments in a bid to boost exports.】

item.title: SpaceX 估值飙升，Alphabet 将再获纸面收益
item.description: 在太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）完成要约收购之后，Alphabet 公司又将获得一笔可观的票据收益，该要约收购对这家控股公司的实际估值约为 8000 亿美元。【原文：Alphabet Inc. is set to book another sizable paper gain after SpaceX completes a tender offer that effectively values the closely held company at about $800 billion.】

item.title: 华尔街看到人工智能泡沫正在形成，并正在博弈如何戳破它
item.description: 自 OpenAI 发布 ChatGPT 引发人工智能热潮以来，三年过去了。尽管资金仍在源源不断地涌入，但人们对好景是否能持续也心存疑虑。【原文：It’s been three years since OpenAI set off euphoria over artificial intelligence with the release of ChatGPT. And while the money is still pouring in, so are the doubts about whether the good times can last.】

item.title: 套利交易的复苏带动新兴市场的复苏，激发对 2026 年的乐观预期
item.description: 大型投资者表示，新兴市场的利差交易在 2026 年还将继续，而这一年是这一流行策略的大丰收之年。【原文：Big investors say that carry trades across emerging markets have further to run in 2026 following a blockbuster year for the popular strategy.】

item.title: 智利举行总统决选，右翼势力有望夺权
item.description: 智利人将在周日的总统决选中投票，预计这将为拉丁美洲最繁荣的国家之一开创一个强硬右翼政治的新时代。【原文：Chileans are voting in Sunday’s presidential runoff that’s expected to usher in a new era of hard-right politics in one of Latin America’s most prosperous nations.】

item.title: 广告公司股有望将人工智能颠覆性技术转化为自身优势
item.description: 2025 年股市的一个重要主题是那些可能因人工智能进步而蒙受损失的股票的下滑，其中最主要的是广告公司。【原文：A key stock-market theme of 2025 has been the slide in shares that stand to lose out from advances in artificial intelligence, chief among them being advertising agencies.】

item.title: 印度加强新德里污染控制，停止建筑施工
item.description: 在空气中的毒素突然激增之后，印度加强了对新德里及附近地区的污染控制。【原文：India stepped up anti-pollution curbs in New Delhi and nearby areas after a sudden spike in airborne toxins.】

item.title: 英国最具影响力智囊团背后的 "破烂变财富 "资本家
item.description: 克莱夫-考德利可以说是当今英国政坛最具影响力的非政治家。他在 20 年前创立的智库 Resolution Foundation 的弟子们如今在威斯敏斯特的大厅里工作，工党政府部长们的头脑中也充满了他的思想。【原文：Clive Cowdery is arguably the most influential non-politician in UK politics today. His proteges at the Resolution Foundation, a think tank he founded 20 years ago, now staff the halls of Westminster and its ideas occupy the minds of Labour’s government ministers.】

item.title: 调查显示：大选在即，泰国总理支持率下降
item.description: 一项民意调查显示，在距离大选不到两个月的时间里，泰国总理阿努丁-差威拉库尔的支持率进一步下降，落后于反对党领袖。【原文：Thai Prime Minister Anutin Charnvirakul’s popularity has dropped further behind the leader of an opposition party, an opinion poll shows, with general elections less than two months away.】

item.title: 亚洲富豪推动 2,000 亿美元复杂股票票据复兴
item.description: 富裕的亚洲投资者正将创纪录的资金投入到复杂的股票赌注中，而就在几年前，这些赌注还曾让他们蒙受巨大损失。【原文：Rich Asian investors are plowing record money into complex stock bets that saddled them with big losses just a few years ago.】

item.title: 澳大利亚预算压力增大，标榜节约 133 亿澳元
item.description: 澳大利亚财政部长吉姆-查默斯（Jim Chalmers）表示，随着政府努力抵消不断上升的支出压力，澳大利亚将在周三的年中预算更新中预订200亿澳元（133亿美元）的节余。【原文：Australia will book A$20 billion ($13.3 billion) in savings in Wednesday’s mid-year budget update as the government works to offset rising spending pressures, Treasurer Jim Chalmers said.】

item.title: 据说 ServiceNow 接近达成以高达 70 亿美元收购 Armis 的交易
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，ServiceNow 公司正在就收购网络安全初创公司 Armis 进行深入谈判，Armis 公司曾有意于明年首次公开募股，这笔交易的估值可能高达 70 亿美元。【原文：ServiceNow Inc. is in advanced talks to buy Armis, a cybersecurity startup that had been eyeing an initial public offering next year, in a deal that may be valued at as much as $7 billion, people familiar with the situation said.】

item.title: 香港和印度助推亚洲筹款热潮
item.description: 不久前，香港的股票销售市场还是中国经济放缓的象征：交易量稀少，投资者情绪低落，银行家纷纷逃离这个行业。今年，情况发生了翻天覆地的变化。【原文：Not long ago, Hong Kong’s share-sale market was a symbol of China’s slowdown: Deal books were thin, investor sentiment was sour and bankers were fleeing the industry. This year, the script has flipped.】

item.title: 塞内加尔计划利用地区债务市场弥补预算缺口
item.description: 塞内加尔将依靠西非地区债务市场来弥补其 2026 年的预算缺口，此前塞内加尔发现了数十亿美元的未报告借款，这使其实际上被国际市场拒之门外。【原文：Senegal will rely on West Africa’s regional debt market to close its 2026 budget gap after uncovering billions of dollars in unreported borrowings, leaving it effectively shut out of international markets.】

item.title: 富裕世界的降息势头正在消退
item.description: 2025 年全球货币政策的最后一轮决策可能会展示发达经济体的宽松周期是如何缺乏新的动力或实际上已经结束的。【原文：The final flurry of global monetary policy decisions for 2025 is likely to showcase how the easing cycle in advanced economies either lacks fresh impetus or is effectively over.】

item.title: 公司债券投资者狂欢，宿醉即将来临：信贷周刊
item.description: 尽管风险并不存在，但公司债券市场上的恐惧情绪又在逐渐消退。【原文：Fear is drifting out of the corporate-bond market again, even if the risks aren’t.】

item.title: 以军事为主导的西非国家启动地区投资银行
item.description: 由军方领导的马里、布基纳法索和尼日尔政府已经启动了一个地区投资银行，初始资本为 5000 亿非洲法郎（约合 8.95 亿美元），用于资助基础设施、能源和农业项目。【原文：The military-led governments of Mali, Burkina Faso and Niger have launched a regional investment bank with an initial capital of 500 billion CFA francs ($895 million) to fund infrastructure, energy and agricultural projects.】

item.title: 可口可乐正在与 TDR 谈判，以挽救 Costa Coffee 的出售：金融时报
item.description: 英国《金融时报》援引知情人士的话报道，可口可乐公司本周末将与 TDR Capital 举行最后的谈判，因为其出售 Costa Coffee 的提议面临破裂的风险。【原文：Coca-Cola Co. is holding last-ditch talks with TDR Capital this weekend as its proposed sale of Costa Coffee faces the risk of collapse, the Financial Times reported, citing people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 万科延期计划未获债券持有人足够支持
item.description: 中国万科集团（China Vanke Co.）未能获得足够的债券持有人支持其延长12月15日到期的地方债券期限的提议，从而加剧了这家曾是全美销售额最大的住宅建筑商的违约风险。【原文：China Vanke Co. failed to obtain sufficient bondholder support for its proposed extension on a local bond due Dec. 15, heightening default risk for what was once the nation’s largest homebuilder by sales.】

item.title: Tether 的 11 亿美元尤文图斯游戏让新资金与旧资金对决
item.description: Tether Holdings SA 收购尤文图斯足球俱乐部（Juventus Football Club SpA）的要约，让一家快速发展的加密货币巨头与一个拥有逾百年历史的意大利工业王朝对决。【原文：Tether Holdings SA’s offer to acquire Juventus Football Club SpA pits a fast-growing crypto powerhouse against a more than century-old Italian industrial dynasty.】

item.title: 中粮国际将首批阿根廷小麦运往中国
item.description: 中国国有农业巨头中粮国际有限公司（Cofco International Ltd.）的贸易部门周六在一份声明中说，中粮国际有限公司正在装载第一批运往中国的阿根廷小麦散货，从而开启了两国之间新的贸易往来。【原文：Cofco International Ltd. is loading the first bulk commercial shipment of Argentine wheat to China, kicking off a new trade flow between the two countries, the Chinese state-owned agricultural giant’s trading unit said in a statement on Saturday.】

item.title: 2026 年，华尔街跳过科技，走 "老派 "增长之路
item.description: 随着新年的临近，一个主题正变得越来越普遍：在牛市中叱咤风云的科技巨头们将不再是主角。【原文：One theme is becoming prevalent as the new year approaches: The technology giants that have been shouldering this bull market will no longer be running the show.】

item.title: 开源代码和核能是人工智能的基石
item.description: David Westin 探讨了为什么开放源代码和核能对人工智能如此重要。【原文：David Westin examines why open-open source code and nuclear energy are so important for AI.】

item.title: 马来西亚将获得与 1MDB 律师有关的毕加索和马蒂斯艺术品
item.description: 马来西亚表示，在与美国官员讨论遣返与 1MDB 全球腐败丑闻有关的资产后，马来西亚将获得 12 件艺术品，其中包括巴勃罗-毕加索（Pablo Picasso）、琼-米罗（Joan Miro）和亨利-马蒂斯（Henri Matisse）的作品。【原文：Malaysia said it will get 12 artworks including those by Pablo Picasso, Joan Miro and Henri Matisse after discussions with US officials to repatriate assets tied to the global corruption scandal at 1MDB.】

item.title: 特朗普的人工智能赌注因失业和通胀担忧而蒙上阴影
item.description: 选民对其承诺越来越怀疑，对其危险越来越担忧。【原文：Voters are becoming increasingly skeptical about its promise and more worried by its perils.】
